improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero error. The variable 'x' will be 0 after the loop.
Unreachable code. The condition 'x > 0' will always be true within the loop, thus 'y = 0' will always execute.
Add input validation to check if 'x' is not zero before division. Or handle the potential division by zero to prevent a program crash.
The loop always sets y to 0; this assignment can be moved outside the loop.
